name: Sonora Medical Systems
overview: Sonora Medical Systems is an ISO-9001 and ISO 13485 certified provider of high quality products and services to the diagnostic ultrasound and MRI markets. Its world renowned acoustic power testing laboratory is ISO 17025 accredited. Sonoraâ€™s products and services are marketed on a direct basis to healthcare providers, dealers and service organizations in North America, and both directly and through distribution to partners in non-U.S. markets. Customers include large and small hospitals, stand-alone imaging centers, clinics, Independent Service Organizations (ISOs) and Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs).

acquisition.source_description: Medical Imaging Holdings, Inc. Acquires Sonora Medical Systems
